mapper.insert: insert into WM_DICTIONARYS (ID, CREATORID, CREATOR, CREATETIME, UPDATERID, UPDATER, UPDATETIME, DCODE, DNAME, FLAG) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updaterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update WM_DICTIONARYS set CREATORID = #{creatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATERID = #{updaterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DCODE = #{dcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DNAME = #{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, CREATORID, CREATOR, CREATETIME, UPDATERID, UPDATER, UPDATETIME, DCODE, DNAME, FLAG from WM_DICTIONARYS where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, CREATORID, CREATOR, CREATETIME, UPDATERID, UPDATER, UPDATETIME, DCODE, DNAME, FLAG from WM_DICTIONARYS order by updateTime desc,updater asc
